title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
**Product Title:** Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)

**Product Description:**

Get ready to enter a world of perfect beauty and perfection in 'Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)'. Set in the vibrant and colorful world of Barbie Land, this film takes you on a journey of self-discovery, love, and acceptance. Follow Barbie as she navigates her way through existential crises and being a Ken, challenging the conventional norms of her perfect world.

**Special Features:**

- **It's a Weird World**: Delve deeper into the quirky side of Barbie Land in this exclusive bonus feature.
- **All-Star Barbie Party**: Join Barbie and her friends as they throw the ultimate party in this fun-filled bonus content.
- **Musical Make-Believe**: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Barbie Land through this magical musical feature.
- **Becoming Barbie**: Explore the making of the film and the transformation of Barbie in this fascinating behind-the-scenes look.
- **Welcome to Barbie Land**: Get an exclusive tour of the vibrant world of Barbie Land in this captivating bonus feature.
- **Playing Dress-Up: An Extended Look at the Costumes of Barbie**: Uncover the artistry and craftsmanship that went into creating the stunning costumes in this extended bonus feature.

**Product Details:**

- Format: Blu-Ray + Digital
- Setting: Barbie Land

**Order now and experience the magic of Barbie Land like never before!**
